div.p: This option attribute on TCHARACTERTYPEROLE is conceptually linked with WRITING TEXTUALFEATURES . It gives more information about the status of a character within a fictional story. It has two values, male and female. Use only in calling attention to a central character who is significant or noteworthy.

div.codeblock: Angela Carter's Nights at the Circus features <TCHARACTERTYPEROLE PROTAGONIST="female">a feathered heroine, a Winged Victory</TCHARACTERTYPEROLE> who achieves fame and notoriety on the trapeze.
